name: Postcards Home
description:
"Dear Grandad, I wish you could be here to see this..."

Postcards Home is a relaxing experience about exploring the world, staying in touch with family, and making the most of the time we have. Fly across Europe and send postcards from the cities you visit on your travels.

Created in a week as part of 8 Bits to Infinity's VimJam.

Credits:

Sound design by Molly Linfield - @mollyrlinfield
